messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 3216
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/2/03 10:32:28 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... This is a beautiful poem, but the really weird thing is that the daughter with cancer thing is
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/2/03 10:32:28 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

> and now the poem:)
>

This is a beautiful poem, but the really weird thing is that the daughter
with cancer thing is a hoax. See the link: <A HREF="http://hoaxbusters.ciac.org/cgi-bin/mfs/www/hoaxbusters/archive?link=http://hoaxbusters.ciac.org/HBSympathy.shtml&file=/www/hoaxbusters/HBSympathy.shtml&line=256#mfs">CIAC Sympathy Hoaxes</A> or copy
and paste: <A HREF="http://hoaxbusters.ciac.org/">http://hoaxbusters.ciac.org/HBSympathy.shtml#littlegirl3</A>. It's
odd that someone would create something so beautiful for such a bazaar
purpose. I've read the poem before, and it still never fails to bring me to
tears because, in any case, the sentiments ring true. Thank you for posting
it.

P.S. The Hoaxbusters website has some really good ones that would fool
anyone, as well as some really hilarious ones.

Wendy in FL


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
